full_text: Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 749 Filed 08/10/22 Page 187 of 236 LC3Cmax7 Parkinson - direct 1 MS. COMEY: While Detective Byrne is doing that, Ms. Drescher, would you please pull up what's been marked for identification as Government Exhibits 51A, B, and C, and show them to the witness, the parties, and the Court. BY MS. COMEY: Q. Mr. Parkinson, do you recognize those three exhibits? A. I do. Q. What are they? A. The table itself in an open position, the manufacturer's label, and a second manufacturer's label. Q. Do these fairly and accurately depict portions of Government Exhibit 51? A. True. MS. COMEY: Your Honor, the government offers these in evidence. MR. EVERDELL: No objection. THE COURT: 51A, B, and C are admitted. (Government's Exhibits 51A, 51B, 51C received in evidence) MS. COMEY: Thank you, your Honor. May we publish? THE COURT: You may. MS. COMEY: Ms. Drescher, would you publish 51A, and then 51B, and then 51C. Q. Mr. Parkinson, according to the manufacturer's labels, where was this table manufactured? SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300 DOJ-OGR-00012701
